name: JumpRateModel
description: Compound's JumpRateModel Contract V2 for V2 cTokens. Supports only for V2 cTokens.

eventDecorators.name: NewInterestParams
eventDecorators.description: Event fired when a item is sold.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event fired when a item is sold.

functionDecorators.name: baseRatePerBlock
functionDecorators.description: The base interest rate which is the y-intercept when utilization rate is 0.

functionDecorators.name: blocksPerYear
functionDecorators.description: The approximate number of blocks per year that is assumed by the interest rate model.

functionDecorators.name: getBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the current borrow rate per block.

parameterDecorators.name: cash
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of cash in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: borrows
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of borrows in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: reserves
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of reserves in the market.

returnDecorators.description: The borrow rate percentage per block as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18).

functionDecorators.name: getSupplyRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the current supply rate per block.

parameterDecorators.name: cash
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of cash in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: borrows
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of borrows in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: reserves
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of reserves in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: reserveFactorMantissa
parameterDecorators.description: The current reserve factor for the market.

returnDecorators.description: The supply rate percentage per block as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18).

functionDecorators.name: jumpMultiplierPerBlock
functionDecorators.description: The multiplierPerBlock after hitting a specified utilization point.

functionDecorators.name: kink
functionDecorators.description: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied.

functionDecorators.name: multiplierPerBlock
functionDecorators.description: The multiplier of utilization rate that gives the slope of the interest rate.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateJumpRateModel
functionDecorators.description: Update the parameters of the interest rate model (only callable by owner, i.e. Timelock).

parameterDecorators.name: baseRatePerYear
parameterDecorators.description: The approximate target base APR, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18).

parameterDecorators.name: multiplierPerYear
parameterDecorators.description: The rate of increase in interest rate wrt utilization (scaled by 1e18).

parameterDecorators.name: jumpMultiplierPerYear
parameterDecorators.description: The multiplierPerBlock after hitting a specified utilization point.

parameterDecorators.name: kink_
parameterDecorators.description: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied.

functionDecorators.name: utilizationRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the utilization rate of the market: `borrows / (cash + borrows - reserves)`.

parameterDecorators.name: cash
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of cash in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: borrows
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of borrows in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: reserves
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of reserves in the market (currently unused).

returnDecorators.description: The utilization rate as a mantissa between [0, 1e18].
